Metadata: South Central California Oil and Gas Project Newsletter for Fishermen and Offshore Operators (Volume 4, Nos. 1-12, January-â€‹December 1987)
The University of California Sea Grant Marine Advisory Program Cooperative Extension

Topics in these twelve newsletter issues include: Status of the eggs and larvae committees study on seismic exploration effects on eggs and larvae; Vessel safety and liability workshop; Seismic permitting program; Oil/Fisheries issues; Geophysical effects on fish resource; California's southern coast undergoing the first stage of lease sale 95; The future of the coast/national conference; Study on geophysical airguns/anchovy eggs and larvae released; Fish updates, seismic survey, Oil and gas and platform information, and more.
